original_text: Now the woman had a fattened calf in the house, and she quickly killed it, and she took flour and kneaded it and baked unleavened bread of it,
korean_text: 여인의 집에 살진 송아지가 있으므로 그것을 급히 잡고 가루를 가져다가 뭉쳐 무교병을 만들고 구워서

sentences.original_text: Now the woman had a fattened calf in the house
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여자는 집에 살찐 송아지가 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and baked unleavened bread of it
